question:
[Ethel] had to work a double shift and needed someone to watch her son [Martin]. Luckily his sister [Leila] was free. [Martin] and his sister, [Leila] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Larry] walked his daughter [Leila] down the aisle on her wedding day. [Ethel] gave birth to a son named [Martin]. [Larry] and his sister, [Michele] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Henry] was playing checkers with his brother [Gordon]. [Henry]'s sister [Leila] was waiting to play. [William] and his sister [Michele] have been best friends ever since childhood.
Question: How is [Gordon] related to [William]?

please provide a detailed analysis.

Step 2: Identify the relationships mentioned in the story:
- Ethel is the mother of Martin and Leila
- Larry is the father of Leila
- Michele is the sister of Martin
- Henry is the brother of Gordon
- William is the brother of Michele

Step 3: Identify the common family members between the two individuals in question (Gordon and William):
- Michele is the sister of Martin and William
- Leila is the sister of Martin and the daughter of Ethel and Larry
- Therefore, Gordon is the brother of William and Michele

Step 4: Based on the information provided, we can conclude that Gordon is the brother of William.
